feature_description: Collects information from callers about issues with their equipment, applications, or environment
problem_statement: The existing ticket system needs to be replaced
functional_requirements: Agent collects caller information (name, ID, email)
Agent collects issue details (category, description, priority)
If caller follows up on existing issue, add call to that issue
Non-employees treated as guest users with employee reference
Agent can reassign open issue to another agent
Agent can send update to caller
Agent can follow up with caller for additional questions
Closed issue may trigger: problem ticket, dev PR, or knowledge article update
user_workflow: Caller contacts via phone or email -> Agent collects caller info and issue details -> Ticket automatically created -> Email confirmation sent to caller -> If follow-up call on existing issue, add call to that issue -> Agent manages issue (resolve, reassign, update status, communicate) -> Issue closed -> Caller updated -> May trigger downstream actions
user_inputs: Caller name, ID, email (for employees); Issue category, description, priority; For guest users: reference to employee
expected_outputs: New ticket created; Email confirmation sent to caller; For follow-ups: call added to existing issue
edge_cases: Non-employees treated as guest users with employee reference
Missing category allowed but should be highlighted
Follow-up calls on existing issue are added to that issue instead of creating duplicate
ui_requirements: New page with ServiceNow workspace-style interface
displayed_information: Date, time, caller, agent, category, priority
data_requirements: tickets, users, employees, calls, categories entities with relationships
data_relationships: Ticket belongs to caller (user/employee); Ticket assigned to agent (user); Agent can reassign to another agent; Call linked to ticket
acceptance_criteria: Agent can resolve an issue directly
Agent can reassign an open issue to another agent
Agent can send an update to the caller
Agent can follow up with caller to ask additional questions
definition_of_done: Caller is updated and issue is closed; A closed issue may prompt actions such as create a problem ticket, create a PR for development team, create or update a knowledge article
